name: Newborn Divinity
description:
forgot a file ahah just  added it separatly but you need to downlad both the .exe en .pck ^^' I've added a zip with all files, it's the same build just reunited x) 

Fresh out of nowhere, you are a newborn divinity. Villagers found you right away and tucked you in an old building, making you their brand new local divinity.

Three villagers where chosen to bring you the wishes of their pairs, but what you do about those requests are up to you.

What kind of divinity will you become, and who will venerate you depends on your choices. 

Whatever is the outcome of your action, it always mean something to someone, and not always what you expected.

What can be considered a failure is up to you. But each of your decision will make you grow as a divinity.

---

ok so this lacks content for the wishes but I guess spending the weekend sleeping was not planned but pretty much needed, so I don't regret it too much. This very short game is more like a proof of concept than anything x)

At least I made cute drawing.

I had fun making it so I migth actually finish it at some point.

-----

I'm french and therefor not a native english speaker, I apologize for any mistake I might have made ><
